title: Dictionaries
description:
A dict is an object that stores a collection of key-value pairs.
Each key is unique and is used to access its corresponding value.

tabs.name: Creating
Accessing
tabs.content:
# Example 2: Accessing a value
my_dict = {'a': 1, 'b': 2}
print(my_dict['a'])
print(my_dict.get('b'))
